name: 2048 Color Classic
description:
Back for more fun?? Combine the numbers and get to the 2048 tile. NOW WITH 5x5 and 6x6! so get to the 8192 and 32768 tiles if you're up for it!

[How to play]
- Swipe left, right, up, or down to move all tiles.
- Combine two tiles with the same number to merge them
- Repeat until you get to tile 2048

[Features]
- Beautiful Colored Design
- 4x4, 5x5, 6x6. If you like the challenge, go for the 6x6!
- Nextpeer Multiplayer, play against your friends and other gamers
- Freebies Daily
- Share your game with the world. We love to see how fast you can get to

Play now. You wont regret it!
